constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 129 (Tuesday, August 2, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ALLEN:
H.R. 8634.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 18 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution
[Page H7545]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: To amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to authorize a study to review specific outcomes of entrepreneurial skills development programs, and for other purposes.
